name: STECInfectionTestsForSTECEColiO157H7OrEColiO157ByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: STEC Infection (Tests for STEC, E. coli O157 H7, or E. coli O157 by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of E. coli O157:H7 or E. coli O157 Organism),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Escherichia coli O157:H7 or Escherichia coli O157 presence or identified (culture or isolate)),(Exclusion Criteria: 20823-1 Escherichia coli O157:H7 [Presence] in Raw milk by Organism specific culture)
